content:
Congratulations on your progress so far! I'd be happy to help you plan out your workouts for the next week.

To create a schedule that meets your goal of 3 times a week at the gym and fits in some outdoor activities, I'll need to know a bit more information from you. Please provide me with the following details:

1. What are your available days and times to work out at the gym? Are you a morning person, lunch break exerciser, or evening gym-goer?
2. What type of outdoor activities do you enjoy? (e.g., walking, jogging, hiking, cycling, swimming, or something else?)
3. How much time can you dedicate to outdoor activities? Would you like to fit in a quick 30-minute walk or a longer, more leisurely activity?
4. Are there any specific days or times when you'd prefer to do outdoor activities (e.g., weekends, weekdays, morning, afternoon)?
5. Do you have any rest days or days when you'd like to take a break from exercise?

Once I have this information, I can help you create a personalized schedule that meets your goals and fits your lifestyle.

(By the way, it's great to hear that you've been enjoying your progress since starting your gym routine on January 2nd! Keep up the good work!)
